decision_conditions: No Additional Plant or TV Equipment
All Other Dwellings to Meet M4(2)
description: .Erection of part 3, part 4 storey building to provide extra care apartments in the form of 70 flats (64x1 bed and 6x2 bed) with courtyards, communal facilities including lounge, multi-use hobby room, laundry, hairdresser / wellbeing room, mobility scooter store, library/flexible staff space together with staff room and office, and associated plant, storage, landscaping and parking.
